import React, { useState } from 'react' import Card from '../../shared/components/UIElements/Card' import Button from '../../shared/components/FormElements/Button' import './PlaceItem.css' const PlaceItem = (props) => { const [showMap, setShowMap] = useState(false) const openMapHandler = setShowMap(true) const closeMapHandler = setShowMap(false) return (

  • {props.title}

    {props.address}

    {props.description}
    • ) } export default PlaceItem
